Actions.Text: REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to increasing solar energy tax credits, implementing a solar STAR credit, and amends provisions relating to the siting of major renewable energy facilities
Summary: Increases solar energy tax credits; implements a solar STAR credit; amends provisions relating to the role of municipalities in siting of major renewable energy facilities.
LawCode: Amd §606, Tax L; add §425-b, RPT L; amd §§140, 141, 142, 144 & 146, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the solar energy system equipment credit; to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a solar STAR credit; and to amend the public service law, in relation to siting major renewable energy facilities
